'''Copper ingots''' are [[metal]] ingots obtained from smelting [[raw copper]] and from killing [[drowned]] or [[copper golem]]s.

=== Smelting ===
Copper ingots can be obtained by smelting [[raw copper]] in a [[furnace]] or [[blast furnace]], as well as the ore itself if mined using [[Silk Touch]].

{{Smelting
|head=1
|Raw Copper
|Copper Ingot
|0.7
}}
{{Smelting
|foot=1
|Copper Ore; Deepslate Copper Ore
|Copper Ingot
|0.7
}}

=== Mob loot ===
When killed by a [[player]] or a tamed [[wolf]], a [[drowned]] has a 11% ({{frac|11|100}}) chance of dropping a copper ingot. With the [[Looting]] enchantment, the chance can be increased to 13% ({{frac|13|100}}) with Looting I, 15% ({{frac|3|20}}) with Looting II, and 17% ({{frac|17|100}}) with Looting III. [[Copper golems]] also drop 1-3 [[copper ingots]] when killed, unaffected by Looting.
{{Drop sources|Copper Ingot}}

=== Repairing ===
Copper ingots are the repair items for the copper [[tier]] and thus can be used to [[repair]] the following items in an [[anvil]]:

*{{ItemLink|Copper Helmet}}
*{{ItemLink|Copper Chestplate}}
*{{ItemLink|Copper Leggings}}
*{{ItemLink|Copper Boots}}
*{{ItemLink|Copper Sword}}
*{{ItemLink|Copper Pickaxe}}
*{{ItemLink|Copper Axe}}
*{{ItemLink|Copper Shovel}}
*{{ItemLink|Copper Hoe}}
*{{ItemLink|Copper Spear}}
